## Source: ossf-package-analysis (1b975fb6f22bd9fcdcea9c2ef29c6fadc73269624920351490d8cda8e561199d)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'remark-canonical-link-plugin' @ 99.0.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
